title: Ffffound account
content:
I really need a ffffound account. Whenever I think about how I kept putting it off before they switched it to invite I get nauseous and feel like my life is incomplete.

Does anyone either have an account or know someone who can invite me? I can trade something! Plush toys, web design, Nestle candy, sewing, design magazines, books.

Thank you!
author: HaleyFiege

comments.content: Why bother? Everything on the internet is getting posted there already ;)
There’s not enough cake on it. I need to fill the cake void.

I would like one too. :)  
Too much crap is posted lately.
How do we know no one who has one?! I asked like the entire internet.
What is Ffffound? Does this have anything to do with FF Meta?

<cite>What is Ffffound? Does this have anything to do with FF Meta?</cite>

or “Psychokiller?”

Uhmm.  
Like.  
You could post your cake pictures here.  
I’d like to see your cake pictures.  
I like cake.

Me like cookie too.  
Me like cookie cake more.

Try [We heart it](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085350/http:/weheartit.com/). Just launched. Same concept as Ffffound but arguably a more functional design, plus tags and comments. Here’s [my page](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085350/http:/weheartit.com/user/stewf).
